Blog shows
Dr. Toast Live - New Year's 2008
posted December 14, 2007

Monday, December 31, 2007 - Dr. Toast is warming up the new year with crispy, toasty goodness in a time-traveling adventure set in a San Francisco underground warehouse.  False Profit presents: SHIFT. Also featuring Alxndr, benchun, DJJD, Maer, Obi-j, DJ Spaceinvader, F'kir, Genji, Hypnotech, and Kitty-D.  Be sure to visit the Trans-Temporal Saloon and Sensorium during your stay!
